edge: Both songs 'Haiya Ho' and 'Chahe Meri Jaan Tu Le Le' from the movie are remakes of each other.
The Pakistani song 'Kinna Sona' from the movie is covered by Pakistani singer Atif Aslam.
The song 'Masakali 2.0' is a recreated version of the song 'Masakali' from the movie Delhi-6.
Atif Aslam is a Pakistani singer who contributed to the soundtrack of the film.
In February 2019, the All Indian Cine Workers Association levied a ban on all Pakistani artists, which resulted in the replacement of Atif Aslam's version for a new one sung by Jubin Nautiyal.

In June 2020, T-Series released the initial cover sung by Atif Aslam on YouTube, but were forced to remove it due to a threat-laced campaign led by the far-right Indian nationalist party: Maharashtra Navnirman Sena.
Atif Aslam covered a song for the film's soundtrack.
